questions.question_text:
The VP of Sales at Universal Containers wants to have a set of screens to guide the inside sales team through collecting and updating data for leads.
How can the app builder accomplish this?

The Recruiting team at AW Computing captures the job acceptance and date of hire of a candidate on the Job Application custom object. Once the candidate accepts the recruiter's Job offer, the date of hire should be entered and not be changed on subsequent record edits.

Which validation formula should the app builder use?

comments.content: You are correct, the correct answer is C: NOT(ISBLANK(Job_Accepted__c)) && ISCHANGED(Hire_Date__c). The formula validates that the "Job Accepted" field is not blank (i.e., the candidate has accepted the job offer) and that the "Hire Date" field is being changed. If both conditions are met, the validation rule will trigger and prevent the change to the "Hire Date" field.

questions.question_text:
An app builder wants to use Process Builder to automate some of the work being done by the sales team.

What are three capabilities of Process Builder that can improve productivity? (Choose three.)

choices.D: Use Process Builder to assign a delegated approver.
choices.B: Set up a delegated approver for the manager.
choices.C: Forward the approval request to the manager's assistant.
choices.A: Have the manager log on and reassign the approval request.

questions.question_text:
When a deal is closed-won, it has to be approved by the owner's manager prior to being added to the leaderboard for a quarterly sales competition. An opportunity is won on the last day of the quarter and the manager is on vacation.

What is recommended to ensure all of the appropriate deals are reviewed and the leaderboard is up to date?

discussion.content:

should be delegated approver

C. Lookup relationship: 

A Lookup relationship is suitable for scenarios where a record in one object is associated with a single record in another object, but the relationship is not mandatory and does not enforce ownership or cascade deletions. In this case, each new Realtor (child record) would have a Lookup field to the experienced Realtor (parent record), indicating the mentor they report to. This setup allows one experienced Realtor to be associated with multiple new Realtors while each new Realtor is linked to only one experienced Realtor.

What type of relationship would an app builder set up to meet this specification?
